channel.title: As HBG-Scape V3 comes close to being released - another opinion needed!
channel.description:
Well HBG-Scape V3 will be out either Today or tommorow (yea I know, omfg sweet!) BUT I need suggestions for places... I want to know what places you guys would like to see in V3...
Please think of places you would want the following to be in, also, for the training area, what monsters do you want to train on???
KBD - KQ - Jad - Pking area - Team pk area - Home -
Current things I have done so far for V3: Full Range working!!! OMFG WOOT Teleports set for most of minigames Stats set Prices set Shops made Emotes set ::starter made and set ::master now gives 99 in ALL stats, and gives correct capes instead of a bunch of random crud :P potions now work - oh yea lol you no longer need runes to cast spells
Current things I have left: Make specials - Changed bases so now I gotta make specials work again :P Make Veng work - once again same as above Add teles on tabs Set palces for home, jad, kq, etc...
So it will be done today or tommorow, so post places please![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 11:10:04 AM[/size][hr]cmon people i need your help!

item.title: As HBG-Scape V3 comes close to being released - another opinion needed!
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

Well HBG-Scape V3 will be out either Today or tommorow (yea I know, omfg sweet!) BUT I need suggestions for places…
I want to know what places you guys would like to see in V3…

Please think of places you would want the following to be in, also, for the training area, what monsters do you want to train on???

KBD -
KQ -
Jad -
Pking area -
Team pk area -
Home -

Current things I have done so far for V3:
Full Range working!!! OMFG WOOT
Teleports set for most of minigames
Stats set
Prices set
Shops made
Emotes set
::starter made and set
::master now gives 99 in ALL stats, and gives correct capes instead of a bunch of random crud
potions now work - oh yea lol
you no longer need runes to cast spells

Current things I have left:
Make specials - Changed bases so now I gotta make specials work again
Make Veng work - once again same as above
Add teles on tabs
Set palces for home, jad, kq, etc…

So it will be done today or tommorow, so post places please![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 11:10:04 AM[/size][hr]cmon people i need your help!

Read full topic
